articles.author: Devi Shastri, Megan Janetsky
articles.title: Measles jumps borders in North America with outbreaks in Canada, Mexico and US - AP News
articles.description: North America’s three biggest measles outbreaks have grown to a total of more than 2,500 known cases. Three people have died in the U.S. and one in Mexico. Mexican and U.S. officials say the strains of measles spreading in Canada match the other large outbrea…
articles.content:
Dr. Hector Ocaranza knew El Paso would see measles the moment it began spreading in West Texas and eastern New Mexico.

articles.title: Kamala Harris Slams Trump’s ‘Narrow, Self-Serving Vision of America’ in Gala Speech - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Kamala Harris spoke out about Donald Trump's “narrow, self-serving vision of America" in a speech at the 20th anniversary gala for Emerge America.
articles.content:
Kamala Harris criticized Donald Trump in a speech in San Francisco last night, noting that his administration has perpetuated a “wholesale abandonment” of America’s highest ideals.
